company_info.name: Occams Advisory
company_info.description: Occams Advisory is a global financing advisory and professional services firm that provides Fortune 500-level expertise to small and medium-sized businesses.
company_info.mission: Serve as a trusted advisor and growth partner through the business lifecycle, from Inception to Infinity.

services.name: Tax Advisory
services.description: Specialized tax advisory services including corporate taxes, international tax issues, transfer pricing, and R&D tax credits.

services.name: Business Services & Growth Incubation
services.description: Strategic planning, operational efficiency enhancements, risk assurance, technology advisory, and business transformation services.

services.name: Capital Markets & Investment Banking
services.description: Assists with mergers and acquisitions, capital raising, financial restructuring, and exit readiness strategies.

services.name: Financial Technology & Payment Solutions
services.description: Tailor-made solutions incorporating the latest financial technologies to simplify and secure financial operations.

awards.name: Inc. 5000
awards.description: Ranked on the Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing private companies in America for eight out of nine years.

awards.name: Financial Times Fastest-Growing Companies
awards.description: Recognized in the Financial Times' 2025 list of the Americas' Fastest-Growing Companies.

awards.name: Fortune America's Most Innovative Companies
awards.description: Named among America's Most Innovative Companies by Fortune in 2023.

social_responsibility.description: Contributes 1-2% of top-line revenue to charitable causes globally, funding educational opportunities and providing essential items to over 45,000 children and adults across North America, Africa, and South Asia.
